subject: [Radiance-general] Radiance-general Digest, Vol 93, Issue 6
body:
Hi Marija
_________________________________________________________________
I'm trying to model one complex blinds' lamelas in Radiance.
I have lamela model in SketchUp but when exported to Radiance it gives 70
surfaces per one lamela - which is too much for simulations.
________________________________________________________________

I guess you have tried something obvius like  editing numbers of segments
of entitities in Sketchup?

regards

--
__________________________________________________________
arq. Evangelos D. Christakou, Dr
prof. adjunto Engenharia Civil e Ambiental -FT/UnB
_______________________________________________________
e-mail: vangelis at unb.br
